availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Richards (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Margaret Robbins Richards in Bath County, Kentucky, on December 26, 1825. Married to Rebecca Richards. Resident of Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 68B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film 000273003.
